byline.contributor: Michael R. Gordon reported from Geneva, and David E. Sanger from Washington.
byline.original: By MICHAEL R. GORDON and DAVID E. SANGER

abstract: Round of high-level talks end with Iranian and American officials considering proposal that would severely limit Iran's nuclear capabilities but ease restrictions slowly over course of at least 10 years.
lead_paragraph: Iranian and American officials considered a proposal that would strictly limit for at least 10 years Tehran’s nuclear production but gradually ease restrictions in the final years of a deal.

headline.main: Negotiators Weigh Plan to Phase Out Nuclear Limits on Iran
headline.print_headline: Negotiators Weigh Plan to Phase Out Nuclear Limits on Iran

snippet: Iranian and American officials considered a proposal that would strictly limit for at least 10 years Tehran’s nuclear production but gradually ease restrictions in the final years of a deal.
